content: उद्दिश्य {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} With reference to, aiming at, in the direction of, towards; वध्यशिलामुद्दिश्य प्रस्थितः <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} For, for the sake of, on account of, in the name of; त्वां° <ls>Ś. 3</ls> on thy account; किं° for what purpose, on what account; निमित्तं° <ls>Pt. 1. 283</ls> for some cause; त्वामुद्दिश्य सभाजनाक्षराणि <ls>M. 5.</ls> in your name. {@--3@} Demanding, stipulating for.
